item.title: My husband and I have been married for 18 years. We share a son — and my husband has a daughter. Why should they get an equal inheritance?
item.description: “This year she got married, and I was completely left out of any planning, bridal-shower and wedding activities.”

item.title: ‘She’s bleeding her retirement dry’: My friend earns $9 an hour, but wastes money on vacations and massages. What can I do?
item.description: ‘She blew through her inheritance fast and paid for the down payment on her car with credit cards’

item.title: ‘I feel like I’ve opened a hornet’s nest’: My mother-in-law lists my husband as beneficiary on her $1 million IRA. But her will says otherwise. Who wins?
item.description: “All of this is causing a lot of turmoil in the family. Does her will trump the IRA beneficiary?”

item.title: The iPhone 16e has one big drawback
item.description: The new device has all the bells and whistles we have come to expect.

item.title: As banks retreat from DEI, Citi is making these changes to its diversity and hiring practices
item.description: Citigroup says it will no longer require “diverse slates of candidates and diverse panels of interviewers.”
